entry.string: The user #(1) is the designated site administrator. If you want to remove this user change the site admin in the roles configuration setting first.
entry.translation: Zee user #(1) is zee deseegneted seete-a edmeenistretur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Iff yuoo vunt tu remufe-a thees user chunge-a zee seete-a edmeen in zee rules cunffeegooreshun setteeng furst. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: The group #(1) is the default group for new users. If you want to remove this group change the roles configuration setting first.
entry.translation: Zee gruoop #(1) is zee deffoolt gruoop fur noo users. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff yuoo vunt tu remufe-a thees gruoop chunge-a zee rules cunffeegooreshun setteeng furst. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: That user has a current active session
entry.translation: Thet user hes a coorrent ecteefe-a sesseeun
